description: Starts a configuration session used to retrieve a deployed configuration. For more information about this API action and to view example CLI commands that show how to use it with the  GetLatestConfiguration API action, see Retrieving the configuration in the AppConfig User Guide.

parameters.name: ApplicationIdentifier
parameters.description: The application ID or the application name.

parameters.name: EnvironmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The environment ID or the environment name.

parameters.name: ConfigurationProfileIdentifier
parameters.description: The configuration profile ID or the configuration profile name.

nested_items.name: InitialConfigurationToken
nested_items.description: Token encapsulating state about the configuration session. Provide this token to the GetLatestConfiguration API to retrieve configuration data.
